languages.text: "Только псих полезет в такое место. Псих, или изгой вроде Комиссара, скрывающийся от охоты... или ты".
"You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."
languages.original_text: "Только псих полезет в такое место. Псих, или изгой вроде Комиссара, скрывающийся от охоты... или ты".

traits.locale_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."

traits.locale_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “只有疯子才会往那种地方跑。去那里的人要么是疯了，要么是像政委走投无路的人，打算去那里躲避追捕……要么就是你。”
languages.original_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."

traits.locale_text: “只有疯子才会往那种地方跑。去那里的人要么是疯了，要么是像政委走投无路的人，打算去那里躲避追捕……要么就是你。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Solo un loco se adentraría en un lugar así. Un loco o un proscrito como el Comisario, que se esconde de la cacería... o como tú».
languages.original_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."

traits.locale_text: «Solo un loco se adentraría en un lugar así. Un loco o un proscrito como el Comisario, que se esconde de la cacería... o como tú».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「あのような場所に足を踏み入れるのは、よほど狂った奴だけだろう。狂っているか、コミッサーのようなはぐれ者か身を潜めるために行くだろうが…貴様にはそこに行ってもらう」
languages.original_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."

traits.locale_text: 「あのような場所に足を踏み入れるのは、よほど狂った奴だけだろう。狂っているか、コミッサーのようなはぐれ者か身を潜めるために行くだろうが…貴様にはそこに行ってもらう」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Man müsste verrückt sein, einen Fuß an einen solchen Ort zu setzen. Verrückt oder ein Verstoßener wie der Kommissar, der sich vor der Jagd versteckt ... oder Euch."
languages.original_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."

traits.locale_text: "Man müsste verrückt sein, einen Fuß an einen solchen Ort zu setzen. Verrückt oder ein Verstoßener wie der Kommissar, der sich vor der Jagd versteckt ... oder Euch."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Il faut être fou pour y mettre les pieds, mais c'est une bonne cachette pour les parias comme le commissaire qui veulent échapper aux chasseurs... ou à vous. »
languages.original_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut être fou pour y mettre les pieds, mais c'est une bonne cachette pour les parias comme le commissaire qui veulent échapper aux chasseurs... ou à vous. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Öyle bir yere ayak basmak için ya deli olmak lazım ya da Komiser gibi yurtsuz. Aklı sıra avdan kaçacak... Ya da senden."
languages.original_text: "You'd have to be insane to set foot in a place like that. Insane, or an outcast like the Commissar, hiding from the hunt... or you."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle bir yere ayak basmak için ya deli olmak lazım ya da Komiser gibi yurtsuz. Aklı sıra avdan kaçacak... ya da senden."
traits.speaker: Anger
